# DailyManagement Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-12-05

## Active Technologies
- Python 3.10 (backend, per `Dockerfile`) + vanilla HTML/CSS/ES6 modules on the frontend + Flask + Flask-JWT-Extended, SQLAlchemy ORM, MySQL (PyMySQL driver), Choices.js/Flatpickr/FullCalendar on the client (main)

## Project Structure
```
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands
cd src; pytest; ruff check .

## Code Style
Python 3.10 (backend, per `Dockerfile`) + vanilla HTML/CSS/ES6 modules on the frontend: Follow standard conventions
